languages.text: "Если однажды наши пути пересекутся вновь, мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}начнем беседу с приветствия{/d}, а не обнаженных клинков". {n}Воин на секунду задумывается.{/n} "Ваш век слишком краток, чтобы надеяться на подобное. Но я буду помнить о нашем обещании, элантах".

traits.locale_text: "Если однажды наши пути пересекутся вновь, мы начнем беседу с приветсвия, а не обнаженных клинков". {n}Воин на секунду задумывается.{/n} "Ваш век слишком краток, чтобы надеяться на подобное. Но я буду помнить о нашем обещании, элантах".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "If our paths cross again one day, we will {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}begin our conversation by greeting one another{/d} and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."
languages.original_text: "Если однажды наши пути пересекутся вновь, мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}начнем беседу с приветствия{/d}, а не обнаженных клинков". {n}Воин на секунду задумывается.{/n} "Ваш век слишком краток, чтобы надеяться на подобное. Но я буду помнить о нашем обещании, элантах".

traits.locale_text: "If our path cross again some day, we will begin our conversation by greeting one another and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If our paths cross again one day, we will {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}begin our conversation by greeting one another{/d} and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If our paths cross again one day, we will {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}begin our conversation by greeting one another{/d} and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Si nuestros caminos vuelven a cruzarse algún día, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}iniciaremos la conversación saludándonos mutuamente{/d} en vez de desenfundar las espadas». {n}Shairenkhei reflexiona unos instantes.{/n} «Tu tiempo en este mundo es demasiado breve para abrigar esta esperanza, pero yo recordaré nuestra promesa, elantach».
languages.original_text: "If our paths cross again one day, we will {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}begin our conversation by greeting one another{/d} and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."

traits.locale_text: «Si nuestros caminos vuelven a cruzarse algún día, iniciaremos la conversación saludándonos mutuamente en vez de desenfundar las espadas». {n}Shairenkhei reflexiona unos instantes.{/n} «Tu tiempo en este mundo es demasiado breve para abrigar esta esperanza, pero yo recordaré nuestra promesa, elantach».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “如果我们的道路未来再次相遇，我们的对话{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}将会以友好的问候开场{/d}，而不是剑拔弩张。”{n}榭伦凯思索着什么。{/n}“不过，你的寿命实在是太短了，恐怕看不到那一天。不过，我仍会记住这个承诺，外界人。”
languages.original_text: "If our paths cross again one day, we will {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}begin our conversation by greeting one another{/d} and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."

traits.locale_text: “如果我们的道路未来再次相遇，我们的对话将会以友好的问候开场，而不是剑拔弩张。”{n}榭伦凯思索着什么。{/n}“不过，你的寿命实在是太短了，恐怕看不到那一天。不过，我仍会记住这个承诺，外界人。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Si nos routes se recroisent un jour, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}nous nous saluerons{/d} au lieu de brandir nos armes. »{n}Shairenkhei réfléchit quelques instants, avant d'ajouter :{/n} « Votre vie est trop courte pour que nous puissions espérer que cela se produise, mais je me souviendrai de notre promesse, elantach. »
languages.original_text: "If our paths cross again one day, we will {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}begin our conversation by greeting one another{/d} and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."

traits.locale_text: « Si nos routes se recroisent un jour, nous nous saluerons au lieu de brandir nos armes. » {n}Shairenkhei réfléchit quelques instants, avant d'ajouter :{/n} « Votre vie est trop courte pour que nous puissions espérer que cela se produise, mais je me souviendrai de notre promesse, elantach. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「いつか我々の道が再び交わることがあれば、刃を抜かずに{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}挨拶から話を始めよう{/d}」{n}シャイレンケイは考え込む{/n}「それを望むには、お前の時間は短すぎる。だが、この約束は覚えておこう、エランタ」
languages.original_text: "If our paths cross again one day, we will {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}begin our conversation by greeting one another{/d} and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."

traits.locale_text: 「いつか我々の道が再び交わることがあれば、刃を抜かずに挨拶から話を始めよう」{n}シャイレンケイは考え込む{/n}「それを望むには、お前の時間は短すぎる。だが、この約束は覚えておこう、エランタ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Sollten unsere Pfade sich eines Tages wieder kreuzen, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}beginnen wir unser Gespräch, indem wir einander grüßen{/d}, nicht indem wir unsere Klingen ziehen." {n}Shairenkhei denkt über etwas nach.{/n} "Eure Zeit auf dieser Welt ist zu kurz, um darauf zu hoffen, doch ich werde unser Versprechen nicht vergessen, Elantach."
languages.original_text: "If our paths cross again one day, we will {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}begin our conversation by greeting one another{/d} and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Sollten unsere Pfade sich eines Tages wieder kreuzen, beginnen wir unser Gespräch, indem wir einander grüßen, nicht indem wir unsere Klingen ziehen." {n}Shairenkhei denkt über etwas nach.{/n} "Eure Zeit auf dieser Welt ist zu kurz, um darauf zu hoffen, doch ich werde unser Versprechen nicht vergessen, Elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yollarımız eğer bir gün yeniden kesişirse {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}konuşmamıza birbirimizi selamlayarak başlayacağız{/d} ve kılıçlarımızı kınından çıkarmayacağız." {n}Shairenkhei, kafasında bir şeyleri ölçüp tartıyor.{/n} "Bu dünyadaki hayatın, böyle bir umuda kapılmak için çok kısa olsa da verdiğimiz sözü hatırlayacağım elantach."
languages.original_text: "If our paths cross again one day, we will {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}begin our conversation by greeting one another{/d} and not unsheathing our blades." {n}Shairenkhei ponders something.{/n} "Your time in this world is too short to hope for it, but I will remember our promise, elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Yollarımız eğer bir gün yeniden kesişirse {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}konuşmamıza birbirimizi selamlayarak başlayacağız{/d} ve kılıçlarımızı kınından çıkarmayacağız." {n}Shairenkhei, bir şeyler ölçüp tartıyor.{/n} "Bu dünyadaki hayatın, böyle bir umuda kapılmak için çok kısa olsa da verdiğimiz sözü hatırlayacağım elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
